trans-unit.source: Implements a markup extension that supports the binding between the value of a property in a template and the value of some other exposed property on the templated control.
You use `TemplateBinding` in template to bind to a value on the control the template is applied to.
trans-unit.target: Usa `TemplateBinding` de plantilla para enlazar a un valor en el control de la plantilla se aplica a.

trans-unit.source: A `TemplateBinding` is more efficient than a <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> but it has less functionality.
trans-unit.target: A `TemplateBinding` es m치s eficaz que un <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> pero tiene menos funcionalidad.

trans-unit.source: Using a `TemplateBinding` is equivalent to using a <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> with the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.TemplatedParent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Con un `TemplateBinding` equivale a usar un <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> con el <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A> propiedad establecida en <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.TemplatedParent%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso de texto XAML

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md).
trans-unit.target: Para [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] obtener informaci칩n, consulte [extensi칩n de marcado TemplateBinding](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> that defines a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> that is horizontal and has rounded corners.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo siguiente muestra un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> que define un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> que es horizontal y tiene esquinas redondeadas.

trans-unit.source: The `TemplateBinding` indicates that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.Background%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border> should be synchronized with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.Background%2A> value that is set on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: El `TemplateBinding` indica que la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.Background%2A> de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border> se deben sincronizar con la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Border.Background%2A> valor que se establece en el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>.

trans-unit.source: You use `TemplateBinding` in your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> when you want to give the user of your control the control over the values of certain properties.
trans-unit.target: Usa `TemplateBinding` en su <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> cuando desee asignar al usuario del control el control sobre los valores de algunas propiedades.

trans-unit.source: For a discussion of this example, see [Styling and Templating](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener una explicaci칩n de este ejemplo, vea [estilos y plantillas](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> control.
trans-unit.target: El siguiente ejemplo se muestra la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> control.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties are bound to the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.HorizontalContentAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.VerticalContentAlignment%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> control that this <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> is applied to.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> y <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> propiedades se enlazan a los valores de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.HorizontalContentAlignment%2A> y <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.VerticalContentAlignment%2A> propiedades de la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> control que este <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> se aplica a.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.TemplateBindingExtension" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.TemplateBindingExtension" /> class.
The identifier of the property being bound.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.TemplateBindingExtension" /> class with the specified dependency property that is the source of the binding.
Gets or sets the converter that interprets between source and target of a binding.
The converter implementation.
trans-unit.target: La implementaci칩n del convertidor.

trans-unit.source: This value defaults to <see langword="null" /> and is typically provided as an optional parameter of the binding.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see langword="null" /> y se proporciona normalmente como un par치metro opcional del enlace.

trans-unit.source: This value is not the <xref:System.Windows.TemplateBindingExtensionConverter>.
trans-unit.target: Este valor no es el <xref:System.Windows.TemplateBindingExtensionConverter>.

trans-unit.source: It is a specific converter pattern supported by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding.
trans-unit.target: Es un modelo del convertidor concreto compatible con [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] enlace de datos.

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso de texto XAML

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md).
trans-unit.target: Para [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] obtener informaci칩n, consulte [extensi칩n de marcado TemplateBinding](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the parameter to pass to the converter.
The parameter being bound as referenced by the converter implementation.
trans-unit.target: El par치metro que se enlaza como referenciado por la implementaci칩n del convertidor.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso de texto XAML

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md).
trans-unit.target: Para [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] obtener informaci칩n, consulte [extensi칩n de marcado TemplateBinding](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the property being bound to.
Identifier of the dependency property being bound.
trans-unit.target: Identificador de la propiedad de dependencia que se va a enlazar.

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso de texto XAML

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md).
trans-unit.target: Para [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] obtener informaci칩n, consulte [extensi칩n de marcado TemplateBinding](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md).

trans-unit.source: An object that can provide services for the markup extension.
May be <see langword="null" /> in this implementation.
Returns an object that should be set as the value on the target object's property for this markup extension.
For <see cref="T:System.Windows.TemplateBindingExtension" />, this is an expression (<see cref="T:System.Windows.TemplateBindingExpression" />) that supports the binding.
The expression that supports the binding.
